name: Swift Sorcery
description:
Something sinister is brewing in the shadows of the land, you've become painfully aware, now it is up to you to set out and investigate, and ultimately put a stop to it before it proves detrimental to the world as you know it, you must be quick to think and act if you hope to survive this ordeal.

Swift Sorcery is a bullet hell shoot-em-up game that was developed within 13 weeks with a team of four artists, two programmers, a designer and a producer.

The controls are as follows:

  • Mouse: Movement
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot
  • Right Mouse Button: Bomb
  • 1: Fire
  • 2: Ice
  • 3: Lightning
